history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: sat_orp. qsimpl time: 1 use: sat_orp.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables m, x, y.

original: intros x y m. split. - intros H1. apply sat_orp in H1. destruct H1 as [H2 | H3]. + apply sound_axiom_K with (x0:=x) (y0:=truep). ++ apply sound_rule_N. intros n H4. apply sat_boxp. intro n'. intro H5. apply H2. apply Korder_identity with (m:=m) (n:=n). ** apply pf_R2. ** auto. ++ apply sound_rule_N. intros n H4. apply sat_boxp. intro n'. intro H5. apply H2. apply Korder_identity with (m:=m) (n:=n). ** apply pf_R2. ** auto. + apply sound_axiom_K with (x0:=y) (y0:=truep). ++ apply sound_rule_N. intros n H4. apply sat_boxp. intro n'. intro H5. apply H3. apply Korder_identity with (m:=m) (n:=n). ** apply pf_R2. ** auto. ++ apply sound_rule_N. intros n H4. apply sat_boxp. intro n'. intro H5. apply H3. apply Korder_identity with (m:=m) (n:=n). ** apply pf_R2. ** auto. - intros H1. destruct H1 as [H2 | H3]. + apply sound_axiom_K with (x0:=x) (y0:=y). ++ intros n H4. apply sat_boxp in H2. apply H2 in H4. apply sat_orp. left. apply H4. ++ apply valide. + apply sound_axiom_K with (x0:=y) (y0:=x). ++ intros n H4. apply sat_boxp in H3. apply H3 in H4. apply sat_orp. right. apply H4. ++ apply valide.
